note.title: raise error on expected size of result set
note.p: With this argument an error is raised if the number of hits in the result list matches the value of the argument.

Assume that the "raise_error_if_result_set_is=ne" argument is specified and the "expected_size_of_result_set=1" argument is specified too. If the number of hits is not equal to "1" an error will be raised.
